marketplace.name: Justin Rich's Plugins
marketplace.description: OpenRouter integration and other Claude Code utilities

plugins.name: openrouter-plugin
plugins.description: Dynamically fetch and switch between 600+ OpenRouter AI models in Claude Code without needing to remember model IDs
plugins.author: Justin Rich

commands.or-models: List, search, and filter OpenRouter models dynamically fetched from the API

skills.openrouter-models: OpenRouter API knowledge and model information

OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: OpenRouter API key for model access
